Metadata.title: VOTO - Voting made easy
Metadata.description: Evaluate the election manifestos and find out which party suits you best.

Election.dataDisclaimer: VOTO does not collect personal data. Your ratings are stored anonymously. You can change this at any time in the site menu.

ThesesIntroPage.introOneDescription: You can give your opinion on **{count, plural, =1 {# statement} other {# statements}}**.
ThesesIntroPage.introTwoTitle: What do you care about most?
ThesesIntroPage.introTwoDescription: If a topic is particularly important to you, you can mark it with the star symbol. This statement will be **counted twice as much**.
ThesesIntroPage.introThreeDescription: Using the **timeline**, you can quickly **navigate** through the statements. By {pointer, select, coarse {tapping} other {clicking}} on one of the circles, you'll jump to the respective statement.

ResultIntroPage.introOneDescription: Here you can see which matches you **align with** the most.
ResultIntroPage.introTwoDescription: **Bookmark** multiple matches to your **watchlist**. Then you can compare the answers from different matches for each question.
ResultIntroPage.introThreeDescription: {pointer, select, coarse {Tap} other {Click}} on a match's **profile** to get more details. There you can also read the **explanations** for each answer.

ThesisCard.starDisabledExplanation: You cannot weight any more theses as the maximum has been reached. However, you can change your weights later on the result page.
ThesisCard.starTooltip: Mark this thesis as especially important. It will count double.

BreakDrawer.title: Stopover
BreakDrawer.descriptionSkip: You have completed {completedTheses, plural, =1 {# statement} other {# statements}} and can now jump directly to the result, although the result may be less accurate.
BreakDrawer.descriptionContinue: To improve the calculation, you can answer {remainingTheses, plural, =1 {# more thesis} other {# more theses}}. Your result will be more accurate and you'll learn more about different topics.

ThesesResultCarousel.useVOTOSort: Use your VOTO for sorting instead
ThesesResultCarousel.thesesSortingInfo: The theses of a VOTO are randomly sorted when answered to avoid influencing you.

ThesesList.explanation: This is how you and the {matchType, select, candidates {candidates} candidates_and_parties {parties and candidates} other {parties}} on your watchlist responded.
ThesesList.explanationNoBookmarks: This is how you and the {matchType, select, candidates {candidates} candidates_and_parties {parties and candidates} other {parties}} responded.
ThesesList.detailsInfo: {pointer, select, coarse {Tap} other {Click}} on <details>Details</details> to see the reason {matchType, select, candidates {of the respective candidate} candidates_and_parties {of the respective party or candidate} other {of the respective party}}.
ThesesList.changeOpinionInfo: {pointer, select, coarse {Tap} other {Click}} on <changeopinion>Change opinion</changeopinion> to change your answer.

ResultList.explanation: Based on {count, plural, =1 {your # answered thesis} other {your # answered theses}} the following result is obtained.

FilterDialog.title: Filter
FilterDialog.search: Search for {matchType, select, candidates {candidates} candidates_and_parties {parties and candidates} other {parties}}...
FilterDialog.sameRatingsDescription: {matchType, select, candidates {Candidates} candidates_and_parties {Parties and candidates} other {Parties}} who have answered the following theses as I have:

CandidatesOrPartiesList.noBookmarks: Your watchlist is empty. By {pointer, select, coarse {tap} other {click}} of the bookmark icon you can add {matchType, select, candidates {candidates} candidates_and_parties {parties and candidates} other {parties}} to the watchlist.
CandidatesOrPartiesList.tooManyFilters: {matchType, select, candidates {No candidates} candidates_and_parties {No parties or candidates} other {No parties}} match your filters. Remove some filters to show {matchType, select, candidates {candidates} candidates_and_parties {parties or candidates} other {parties}}.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
